job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and maintenance of the server-side logic and infrastructure of software applications.
This indicates the responsibility for building and implementing features within a software product, a core software development activity.
Developing APIs is a fundamental aspect of backend software development, enabling communication between different software components.
This phrase describes the process of gathering and bringing data into a system, which falls under data engineering responsibilities.

soft_skills.phrase: plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend development, API creation, and data services. There is no mention of Generative AI, LLMs, diffusion models, or related specialized tasks, making it not a fit for the GenAI Engineer profile.
